response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $1,200,000. To ensure we both benefit from this opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This offer is valid for a limited time, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 1500000}
